column5: Hi all, had to share....very proud of my boy's 21"er he got last night to win our short 1 hour competition.http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pv2WDAGMah8http://i907.photobucket.com/albums/a...eyangler/i.jpghttp://i907.photobucket.com/albums/a...angler/g-1.jpghttp://i907.photobucket.com/albums/a...eyangler/j.jpg
Great Video Enjoy those moments. Looks like you will have many more to come also. Nice Job
Love to see the new generation enjoying fishing!How on the earth did he manage to catch a fish on that "LOW TECH" equipment though!
Great pictures and video! Great father son memories made. I like how you are really patience letting him net the fish. I need to work on that
This is so great- You're an awesome Dad!
Great video... Makes me laugh out loud...
Just TOO cool What a little man you have there!!
